mapper.select: SELECT C4.RCGVP_KNM , S1.PDCT_PD_CD /* 제품상품코드 */ , P2.PD_PRP_VAL20 AS PDCT_PD_GRP_CD , C2.SELL_TP_CD FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C2 ON C1.CNTR_NO = C2.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL C3 ON C2.CNTR_NO = C3.DTL_CNTR_NO AND C2.CNTR_SN = C3.DTL_CNTR_SN AND C3.ADRPC_TP_CD = '3' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN C3.VL_STRT_DTM AND C3.VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS C4 ON C3.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = C4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ S1 ON C2.CNTR_NO = S1.CNTR_NO AND C2.CNTR_SN = S1.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 ON C2.BASE_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL P2 ON S1.PDCT_PD_CD = P2.PD_CD AND P2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND P2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND C2.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND C2.CNTR_SN = ${cntrSn}

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN S1.WK_ACPTE_STAT_CD = 'Y' AND S1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD IN ('00', '10') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ACPTE_CT /* 수락된오더 건수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_CNFMDT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND S1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD IN ('00', '10') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS VST_CNFM_CT /* 당일방문예정오더 건수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD != '3130' AND S1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD IN ('20') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FSH_CT /* 완료건수(설치환경점검은 제외) */ FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ S1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ S2 ON S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = S2.CST_SV_ASN_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND S1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND S1.CNTR_SN = ${cntrSn}

SELECT C1.OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO AS CNTR_NO , C1.OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN AS CNTR_SN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL C1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND C1.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = #{relDtlCd} /* 216 :모종결합, 221: 홈케어멤버십 */ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN C1.VL_STRT_DTM AND C1.VL_END_DTM AND C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND C1.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND C1.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN = ${cntrSn}
mapper.delete:
UPDATE TB_SVPD_SDING_SPP_PLAN_IZ /* 모종배송계획내역 */ SET DTA_DL_YN = 'Y'
WHERE 1 = 1 AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} /* 계약번호 */ AND CNTR_SN = ${cntrSn} /* 계약일련번호 */ AND SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = #{svBizHclsfCd} /* 서비스업무대분류코드 */ AND SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = #{svBizDclsfCd} /* 서비스업무세분류코드 */ AND SPP_ORD_NO = #{sppOrdNo} /* 배송주문번호 */ AND SPP_PLAN_SN = ${sppPlanSn} /* 배송계획일련번호 */

UPDATE TB_SVPD_SDING_SPP_EXP_IZ /* 모종배송예정내역 */ SET DTA_DL_YN = 'Y'
WHERE 1 = 1 AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} /* 계약번호 */ AND CNTR_SN = ${cntrSn} /* 계약일련번호 */ AND SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = #{svBizHclsfCd} /* 서비스업무대분류코드 */ AND SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = #{svBizDclsfCd} /* 서비스업무세분류코드 */ AND SPP_ORD_NO = #{sppOrdNo} /* 배송주문번호 */ AND SPP_PLAN_SN = ${sppPlanSn} /* 배송계획일련번호 */ AND SDING_SN = ${sdingSn} /* 모종일련번호 */
